text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Strolling down the street one<n>weekend, I happen to spot
Mejiro<n>McQueen, who appears to be in high<n>spirits.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hm hm hmm! ♪ Don't stop! Go for<n>victory!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I've been waiting all week for<n>this!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Better enter the karaoke place before<n>someone spots—
choice_data_list: Going to do some karaoke?
Going to do some karaoke?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Eek! T-Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Urgh... Th-that's right.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That is to say... I was thinking of<n>going to practice my
winning concert<n>songs.
choice_data_list: In that case, do you want to go together?
In that case, do you want to go together?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Eh? You wish to come along too?
choice_data_list:
You said it was for the winning concerts, right?
I'll help out.

You said it was for the winning concerts, right?
I'll help out.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: W-well... Thank you. Let's be on our<n>way, then...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Something feels rather off about<n>McQueen, but I follow her
into the<n>karaoke place.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Whew. Let's pause it there for now.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
What did you think about my singing?<n>Did you identify any
points for<n>improvement?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's sung through quite the<n>assortment of songs, but she
doesn't<n>seem to be enjoying it much.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Just where did that good mood<n>disappear off to?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Is something the matter?
choice_data_list: Am I a bother by being here?
Am I a bother by being here?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh?! What makes you say that?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That's not the case at all. But how<n>can I say this...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, I should just be honest here.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The truth is, I didn't come to karaoke<n>today to practice
Winning Concert<n>songs. Actually...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I wanted to sing some fight songs.
choice_data_list: Fight songs?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Yes, like the ones you hear fans sing<n>at sporting events to
support their<n>team. They're called fight songs.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I happen to attend sporting events<n>myself sometimes... Once
in a blue<n>moon, really.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I occasionally like to sing fight songs<n>at karaoke on my
days off as well.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That's the real reason why I came<n>here today...
choice_data_list: Why not belt some out, then?
Why not belt some out, then?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I-I shall do nothing of the sort! I can't<n>have you seeing me
act in such a<n>juvenile fashion!
choice_data_list: What if I joined you?
What if I joined you?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Uh... Y-you want to join in?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Now w-wait just a moment. I can go<n>without doing it today,
okay?
choice_data_list: Nah, let's sing together!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: But again, I don't want you to see<n>how I get...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Wait, you've already entered a<n>song?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Urgh, in that case...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: BRING 'EM HOME, YU-TA-KA!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: BRING 'EM HOME, YU-TA-KA!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Any sense of shame that McQueen<n>had felt earlier is driven
off by the<n>fiery chants.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: We shout just as if we were in the<n>stands at a ballpark.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, well, that was a bit<n>embarrassing. Though, admittedly,
it<n>was also quite fun.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: If I could, I'd go watch a game right<n>this instant.
choice_data_list: How did you come to like watching sports?
How did you come to like watching sports?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If I had to say... I suppose I love the<n>atmosphere at the
venue.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
As a member of the Mejiro family,<n>I've always felt it
important to<n>maintain my composure at all times.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
So when I went to my first sports<n>stadium, I was quite taken
aback. It all<n>just seemed so lively.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The fact that there could be a place<n>where no one would
judge you for<n>shouting and flouncing about...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I found the experience to be very<n>fresh and inviting.
choice_data_list: So you ended up finding a new kind of fun?
So you ended up finding a new kind of fun?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, you could say that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
In any case, what do you say to<n>getting back to singing?
I'm still rather<n>fired up!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Oh, now that we've left, I can't help<n>but feel embarrassed
after all. I hope<n>the other patrons weren't able to<n>hear me.
choice_data_list: You were having so much fun though!
You were having so much fun though!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Well yes, that is true. It has been a<n>long while since I was
able to let loose<n>to such an extent.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Though you must promise me this,<n>Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Not a word about this will get out tothe other students or staff. And ifpossible, I would like you tocompletely forget about it too...
